Package model

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
model.Payment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Payment extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the Payment Class, to calculate the cost of the ticket.
Since:
2022-10-30
Version:
3.0
Author:
Guo Sihan, Davyn Yam JunHao, Wang Yu Teng, Aditya Pugalia, Ng Yong Jian
See Also:

    • calPrice

      public double calPrice(Show show, String seat_index, MoviegoerType mType)
      A Function to calculate price of a ticket depending on certain factors. e.g holiday/senior/student/senior/is3d/isPlat etc. -> all taken from Show and MoviegoerType
      Parameters:
      show - The show being used.
      seat_index - The seat index of the movie goer.
      mType - The movie goer type.
      Returns:
      The final price of the ticket to be paid by the Movie Goer.

    • discountedPrice

      public double discountedPrice(double price, String card_name)
      A function used to calculate discounted price when a loyalty card is used.
      Parameters:
      price - The current price.
      card_name - The name of the loyalty card.
      Returns:
      discounted price of ticket

    • generateTID

      public String generateTID(Cinema cinema)
      A Method to generate the transaction ID after payment is made.
      Parameters:
      cinema - The cinema associated to the ticket purchased.
      Returns:
      The transaction ID.
